description.value: The zombie spits acid as a ranged Strike with a range of 30 feet. This uses the highest attack bonus among the zombie's Strikes and deals [[/r {1d12}[acid]]]{1d12 acid damage} per 3 levels of the zombie (or [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6 acid damage} below level 3). On a critical hit, the target also takes [[/r {1d4}[persistent,acid]]]{1d4} @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent acid Damage} per 3 levels of the zombie. Once used, the zombie must spend 1 action to cough up enough acid to use this ability again.
